entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:43 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:43 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
